page.title: 01Mid Sussex area rural beauty
page.content: {Landscape:}The{rural landscape}is deciduous but large areas are farmed. The{River Ouse}meanders in its lower course towards the south coast. Barge traffic used to reach the{Sloop {Inn}(385244) {Farming:}There are{dairy}and{arable} {farms}and{soft fruit}market garden produce. The climate is temperate. The soil is fertile and there is good grazing for sheep. {Tourism:} The{Bluebell Railway}is the main tourist attraction. {Freshfield {Halt}(379257) is the middle of three stops. This railway is to be extended over the next fifteen years. Many ancient working steam engines are used. {Education: GREAT WALSTEAD}is an{ Independant Co-educational Preparatory Boarding and Day School with 330 pupils.
